bibl.note: This is a letter from William Barker to A. Fergusson, dated March 16,1830. Barker is requesting that Fergusson send him money that is due to Barker from Mr. Green.

div1.p: yours of Febuary 15 came duly to hand __ please send me the proceeds of Mr Greens note by the first safe hand and Oblige Yours

closer.add:
The Steam Boat Franklin
will be in on at your City soon
prehaps you will have a chance
to send it by som one of your a
quantance

O Green Dr $ 16,, & 8
amount to be sent to Will H Barker $ 72
